nodes.excerpt: Filter bubbles impair our ability to communicate with others and threaten our sense of reality. However, many people don't know they are in one! Blindspotter analyzes your news interactions on Twitter and lets you know if you have a blindspot, left or right.
nodes.title: Blindspotter - Visualize your news blindspots
nodes.author: Harleen Kaur

localize.description: 过滤器气泡损害了我们与他人沟通的能力，威胁到我们的现实感。然而，许多人不知道他们是在一个! Blindspotter分析你在Twitter上的新闻互动，让你知道你是否有盲点，左或右。
localize.tagline: 将您的新闻盲点可视化

localize.description: 過濾器氣泡損害了我們與他人溝通的能力，威脅到我們的現實感。然而，許多人不知道他們是在一個! Blindspotter分析你在Twitter上的新聞互動，讓你知道你是否有盲點，左或右。
localize.tagline: 將您的新聞盲點可視化

nodes.excerpt: Paid Rooms lets you host paywalled private clubhouse rooms. Set one up in less than 30 seconds, simply: 1) Sign up with your phone number 2) Enter your room details 3) Share it an get paid 💰
nodes.title: Paid Clubhouse Rooms - Charge $$$ for Clubhouse rooms

localize.tagline: 会所房间收费$$$

nodes.excerpt: Stike allows you to use your Debit Card, Credit Card or Bank account to instantly send and receive funds with 0 fees using the Bitcoin Lightning network to transmit payments. Users can also send to regular Bitcoin addresses as well.
nodes.title: Strike - Send money instantly, with no fees, anywhere in the world
nodes.author: Henk Holveck

localize.description: Stike允许您使用您的借记卡、信用卡或银行账户以0费用使用比特币闪电网络即时发送和接收资金，传输支付。用户也可以向普通的比特币地址发送。
localize.tagline: 在世界任何地方即时汇款，不收取任何费用。

localize.description: Stike允許您使用您的借記卡、信用卡或銀行賬戶以0費用使用比特幣閃電網絡即時發送和接收資金，傳輸支付。用戶也可以向普通的比特幣地址發送。
localize.tagline: 在世界任何地方即時匯款，不收取任何費用。

nodes.excerpt: GPU.LAND offers GPU instances for Deep Learning — at dirt-cheap prices. How cheap? Up to 80% cheaper vs major cloud providers. We believe everyone, and not just "Big Tech", should be able to train AI models. So we built the cheapest place on the web to do it.
nodes.title: GPU.LAND - Affordable cloud GPUs for deep learning
nodes.author: Chris Messina

localize.description: GPU.LAND为深度学习提供GPU实例--价格很便宜。有多便宜？与主要的云供应商相比，便宜了80%。我们相信每个人，而不仅仅是 "大科技"，都应该能够训练AI模型。因此，我们建立了网络上最便宜的地方来做这件事。
localize.tagline: 用于深度学习的平价云GPU

localize.description: GPU.LAND爲深度學習提供GPU實例--價格很便宜。有多便宜？與主要的雲供應商相比，便宜了80%。我們相信每個人，而不僅僅是 "大科技"，都應該能夠訓練AI模型。因此，我們建立了網絡上最便宜的地方來做這件事。
localize.tagline: 用於深度學習的平價雲GPU

nodes.title:
At $7.72 trillion, the Fed's Balance Sheet hit another new high this week.

The Fed's total assets have increased $3.55 trillion since the beginning of 2020 and they have promised to keep buying bonds at a rate of $120 billion per month going forward. https://t.co/MMvWqU9Nne
nodes.author: Charlie Bilello

localize.full_text:
7.72万亿美元，美联储资产负债表本周再创新高。

自2020年初以来，美联储的总资产增加了3.55万亿美元，他们承诺未来将以每月1200亿美元的速度继续购买债券。https://t.co/MMvWqU9Nne。

7.72萬億美元，美聯儲資產負債表本週再創新高。

自2020年初以來，美聯儲的總資產增加了3.55萬億美元，他們承諾未來將以每月1200億美元的速度繼續購買債券。https://t.co/MMvWqU9Nne。

nodes.excerpt: Can't find the right words to start a conversation? We have used GPT-3 to generate dozens of thousands of Tinder openers and picked the best of them (according to our limited experience).
nodes.title: +500 Openers for Tinder written by GPT-3 - GPT-3 generated thousands of openers & we picked the best
nodes.author: Jan A. Kolar

localize.description: 找不到合适的开场白？我们使用GPT-3生成了数万条Tinder开场白，并从中挑选出最好的开场白（根据我们有限的经验）。
localize.tagline: GPT-3产生了数以千计的打开器，我们挑选了最好的打开器。

localize.tagline: GPT-3產生了數以千計的打開器，我們挑選了最好的打開器。

nodes.excerpt: Macro helps teams supercharge their manual and repetitive processes. Our powerful checklist allows teams to quickly document processes, assign tasks, track progress, and automate common actions.
nodes.title: Macro - Supercharge your team’s processes
nodes.author: Ryan

localize.description: Macro帮助团队超额完成人工和重复性流程。我们强大的核对表使团队能够快速记录流程、分配任务、跟踪进度，并将常见的操作自动化。

nodes.excerpt: Zyla is the fastest end-to-end headless commerce stack that blends cutting-edge content management and commerce tools that can accept payments and ship worldwide instantly once deployed to Vercel.

nodes.excerpt: Find the most converting headline on your landing site with Juggler! It is an intuitive and straightforward A/B testing tool for your site and it's fully online. Just add the lightweight script on your site and you are ready to find the best headline!
nodes.title: Juggler.dev - The easiest way to proceed A/B testing on your site
nodes.author: Vlad Dekhanov

localize.description: 用Juggler在你的登陆网站上找到最具转化率的标题! 它是一个直观直接的A/B测试工具，为您的网站，它是完全在线的。只需在您的网站上添加轻量级脚本，您就可以找到最好的标题了!
localize.tagline: 在您的网站上进行A/B测试的最简单方法。

localize.description: 用Juggler在你的登陸網站上找到最具轉化率的標題! 它是一個直觀直接的A/B測試工具，爲您的網站，它是完全在線的。只需在您的網站上添加輕量級腳本，您就可以找到最好的標題了!
localize.tagline: 在您的網站上進行A/B測試的最簡單方法。

nodes.excerpt: BlockSurvey is an online form and survey platform with a focus on privacy and security. Think of it as an alternative to SurveyMonkey, Typeform, Google Forms but with a focus on privacy and security. It is powered by Stacks Blockchain.

localize.description: BlockSurvey是一个注重隐私和安全的在线表格和调查平台。把它看作是SurveyMonkey、Typeform、Google Forms的替代品，但注重隐私和安全。它由Stacks Blockchain提供支持。
localize.tagline: 由Stacks区块链提供支持的安全表格和调查问卷。

nodes.excerpt: Bring your projects up to a whole new level using Artify's illustrations plugin, now available directly inside Figma. Through this new plugin you can search & import over 5000 illustrations with over 70 different design styles directly in your figma projects.

nodes.excerpt: This iOS widget pack allows you to track your Gumroad analytics with beautiful charts on your iPhone or iPad's home screen via iOS shortcuts. The dashboard pulls in metrics from Gumroad such as orders/revenue, plus breaks down your most popular products. 📊

nodes.excerpt: The pack you've been looking for to bring your website or app to the next level. This pack contain 100 animated icons, rendered in svg, ready to be integrated to your website. The pack will be regularily updated with new versions of the icons to fit all your needs.

nodes.excerpt: Take a Walk lets you take virtual walks around the world, filtering by country, time of day and weather. Enjoy the sigths of cities all around the world, and relax with the sounds that they have to offer!
nodes.title: Take a Walk - Relax, in your favorite places on earth

localize.description: Take a Walk让您可以在世界各地进行虚拟散步，按国家、时间和天气进行筛选。欣赏世界各地的城市风光，聆听它们的声音，放松心情!
localize.tagline: 在地球上你最喜欢的地方放松

localize.description: Take a Walk讓您可以在世界各地進行虛擬散步，按國家、時間和天氣進行篩選。欣賞世界各地的城市風光，聆聽它們的聲音，放鬆心情!

nodes.excerpt: Showwcase is a social network built and optimised for developers. Developers can connect, share their knowledge and showcase their projects with like-minded individuals. For developer content creators, you can make money via paid subscribers.
nodes.title: Showwcase - A social network for developers that lets you make money
nodes.author: Rong Liew

localize.tagline: 一个让你赚钱的开发者社交网络。

localize.tagline: 一個讓你賺錢的開發者社交網絡。

nodes.excerpt: Bankiom is kind of Expedia for your money Track all your money Send money like texting Grow your wealth like a pro in a fun way Your mission if you choose to accept it is to catch our bugs & provide your feedback Let’s change the world one account at a time!
nodes.title: Bankiom - Smart online banking app to connect your money to your dream
nodes.author: Aguu

localize.description: Bankiom是一种为你的钱而设的Expedia 追踪你所有的钱 像发短信一样发钱 以一种有趣的方式像专业人员一样增长你的财富 如果你选择接受它，你的任务是抓住我们的错误和提供你的反馈 让我们一次改变一个账户的世界!
localize.tagline: 智能网银应用，让你的钱和梦想连接起来。

localize.tagline: 智能網銀應用，讓你的錢和夢想連接起來。

nodes.excerpt: Developers have been using the Grouparoo UI to set up automated data movement from their databases to cloud-based tools like Mailchimp. Grouparoo now supports declarative code to set up this pipeline so you manage data sync just like you would any other app.
nodes.title: Grouparoo 2.0 - Integrate with marketing tools using low-code configuration
nodes.author: Hiten Shah

localize.description: 开发人员一直在使用Grouparoo用户界面来设置从他们的数据库到Mailchimp等云端工具的自动数据移动。Grouparoo现在支持声明式代码来设置这个管道，所以你可以像管理其他应用一样管理数据同步。
localize.tagline: 使用低代码配置与营销工具集成

localize.description: 開發人員一直在使用Grouparoo用戶界面來設置從他們的數據庫到Mailchimp等雲端工具的自動數據移動。Grouparoo現在支持聲明式代碼來設置這個管道，所以你可以像管理其他應用一樣管理數據同步。
localize.tagline: 使用低代碼配置與營銷工具集成

nodes.excerpt: You know how gradients are trendy, but adding a slight noise filter or grain to them is even trendier? Well now you don't have to crack open photoshop to get that effect with your own colors. Just go to noiseandgradient.com!
nodes.title: Noise and Gradient - Generate trendy textures of your own, for free
nodes.author: clara 🕶

localize.description: 你知道渐变是多么时髦，但给它们添加轻微的噪点滤镜或颗粒更时髦？好了，现在你不用打开photoshop就能用自己的颜色得到这种效果。只要去 noiseandgradient.com!
localize.tagline: 免费生成您自己的时尚纹理。

localize.tagline: 免費生成您自己的時尚紋理。

nodes.title:
did anyone contact McKinsey yet on the canal thing?

could be some real synergies they haven't considered just yet
nodes.author: Ben Carlson

localize.full_text:
有人联系过麦肯锡了吗 关于运河的事情？

可能会有一些真正的协同效应，他们还没有考虑到。

有人聯繫過麥肯錫了嗎 關於運河的事情？

可能會有一些真正的協同效應，他們還沒有考慮到。
